meanings.definition: The state or quality of being numerous.
meanings.sent1: The numerousness of stars in the sky is breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The numerousness of books in the library made her eyes widen in amazement.
meanings.sent3: The numerousness of cookies in the jar tempted him to sneak a few more.
meanings.sent4: The numerousness of flowers in the garden painted a colorful canvas of nature.
meanings.sent5: The numerousness of students in the classroom created a lively atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: She was surprised by the numerousness of balloons at the party.
meanings.sent2: The numerousness of trees in the forest was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The numerousness of socks in the drawer seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: The numerousness of waves crashing against the shore was both powerful and calming.
meanings.sent5: The numerousness of birds chirping in the morning signaled the start of a new day.
